member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.InnerElementReference
member.summary: Exposes a Blazor ElementReference of the wrapped around HTML element. It can be used e.g. for JS interop, etc.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.DebounceTime
member.summary: Notification debounce timeout in ms. If set to 0 notifications happens immediately. -1 disables automatic notification completely. Notification will only happen by pressing Enter key or onblur, if set.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.Value
member.summary: Value of the rendered HTML element. Initial field value can be set to given string or omitted (leave empty). Also control actual value can be read out (useful when MinLenght not reached).

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.MinLength
member.summary: Minimal length of text to start notify, if value is shorter than MinLength, there will be notifications with empty value "".

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.ForceNotifyByEnter
member.summary: Notification of current value will be sent immediately by hitting Enter key. Enabled by-default. Notification will obey MinLength rule, if length is less, then empty value "" will be sent back.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.ForceNotifyOnBlur
member.summary: Same as ForceNotifyByEnter but notification triggered onblur event, when focus leaves the input field.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.OnInput
member.summary: Callback function called when HTML control received keyboard inputs.

member.name: P:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.OnValueChanged
member.summary: Callback function called when value was changed (debounced) with field value passed into.

member.name: M:Majorsoft.Blazor.Components.Debounce.DebounceTimerBase.Dispose
member.summary: Dispose component

member.summary: Callback function called when value was changed (debounced) with field value passed into.

member.summary: Dispose component
